Causal Inference in R

Welcome to the Causal Inference in R Blog! Here you’ll find more information about our packages, book, courses, and other information about causal inference.

If you’re looking for our book or workshop website, you can find them here:

  • Book
  • Workshop

R Packages

We develop opinionated R packages to make causal inference in R easier and more principled. Our packages are designed to work well with each other and in the Tidyverse. They’re also quite modular, meaning you can pick and choose the packages you like to work in a wide variety of settings. You can find the source code for these packages on our GitHub organization.
